events.name: HackerspaceSG End-of-Year Party
events.description:
HackerspaceSG, the Singapore tech scene's community centre, is having its end-of-year party on December 26. We're throwing a party to celebrate!

* Note: dinner tickets are available on our website (click on Find Tickets above this). Don't miss out on our early bird price, which ends on Friday night (we're extending this as we missed out some marketing channels)!

If you've ever been a part of HackerspaceSG in some way, whether as a current or former member (thanks for your continued support, guys!), event attendee, or tech/startup scene enthusiast, we welcome you to come celebrate the progress of Singapore's tech community with us!

Programme:
• 6:00pm — Event starts. (Doors are always open!)
• 7:00pm — Dinner time. (See below for menu and ticketing information.) 
• 9:00pm — More fun and games. (Show and tell, anyone?)

There'll be side activities like nerf guns, drones, unicycles, Cards Against Humanity, and BYO drinks.

(Tickets aren't required if you're not joining us for dinner — just drop by!)

● FOOD ●
For dinner, Meng will be cooking up his famous Meng's meat. Dinner tickets are $30 each.

Menu:
Deep-Fried, Sous-Vide, 36-Hour, All-Belly Porchetta
(Or, "the most freaking delicious thing to ever come out of my kitchen" — J. Kenji López-Alt)

Get tickets now: 
https://hackerspace.sg/events/eoy2015/

Early bird ticket sales end on Friday, 25 December, 11:59pm. Don't miss out!

● SPONSORSHIP ●
If you're interested in helping make our celebrations even more amazing, please PM the HackerspaceSG page.
